name: Restaurant Site Template
description: Complete restaurant website template with menu, reservations, and contact pages, built using SEVDO frontend compiler
author: SEVDO Team

backend.description: FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL database for reservations and menu management

pages.Home.s: Homepage with hero, featured dishes, testimonials, and hours
pages.Menu.s: Complete menu organized by categories with pricing
pages.About.s: Restaurant story, chef information, and values
pages.Reservations.s: Booking form, policies, and private event information
pages.Contact.s: Contact details, directions, services, and social media

customization.address: 123 Via Roma Street, Little Italy District, San Francisco, CA 94133

features: Responsive design optimized for mobile dining customers
Menu management with categories and dietary indicators
Operating hours display with current status

installation.backend: Copy auth.py and restaurant_models.py, configure database
installation.frontend: Compile .s files using SEVDO frontend compiler
installation.customization: Edit template.json values and restaurant details
